blocks.name: cats1co
blocks.content: Closure of concatenation with a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cats1co(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, cconcat, cs1(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cword(c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c3), c7))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c7, cconcat, cs1(cfv(c0, c4))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccom(c0, c1), c2, ccom(c0, co(c3, cconcat, cs1(c4))), co(c7, cconcat, cs1(cfv(c0, c4))), w0)
  eqtrd(ccom(c0, co(c3, cconcat, cs1(c4))), co(c7, cconcat, cs1(cfv(c0, c4))), co(ccom(c0, c3), cconcat, ccom(c0, cs1(c4))), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, co(c3, cconcat, cs1(c4))), co(ccom(c0, c3), cconcat, ccom(c0, cs1(c4)))), wcel(c3, cword(c5)), wcel(cs1(c4), cword(c5)), wf(c0, c5, c6))
  s1cld(c4, c5, w0)
  ccatco(c3, c5, cs1(c4), c0, c6)
  oveq12d(ccom(c0, c3), cconcat, ccom(c0, cs1(c4)), c7, cs1(cfv(c0, c4)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, cs1(c4)), cs1(cfv(c0, c4))), wcel(c4, c5), wf(c0, c5, c6))
  s1co(c4, c5, c0, c6)
  coeq2i(c0, c1, co(c3, cconcat, cs1(c4)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cats1co(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c3[++]<" c4 ">)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Word(c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c5 ‚Üí c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c3)= c7)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c7[++]<"(c0 ` c4)">)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((c0 ‚àò c1), c2, (c0 ‚àò(c3[++]<" c4 ">)), (c7[++]<"(c0 ` c4)">), w0)
  eqtrd((c0 ‚àò(c3[++]<" c4 ">)), (c7[++]<"(c0 ` c4)">), ((c0 ‚àò c3)[++](c0 ‚àò <" c4 ">)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ‚àò(c3[++]<" c4 ">))=((c0 ‚àò c3)[++](c0 ‚àò <" c4 ">)), c3 ‚àà Word(c5), <" c4 "> ‚àà Word(c5), (c0 : c5 ‚Üí c6))
  s1cld(c4, c5, w0)
  ccatco(c3, c5, <" c4 ">, c0, c6)
  oveq12d((c0 ‚àò c3), cconcat, (c0 ‚àò <" c4 ">), c7, <"(c0 ` c4)">, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àò <" c4 ">)= <"(c0 ` c4)">, c4 ‚àà c5, (c0 : c5 ‚Üí c6))
  s1co(c4, c5, c0, c6)
  coeq2i(c0, c1, (c3[++]<" c4 ">))
}

blocks.name: cats1fvn
blocks.content: The last symbol of a concatenation with a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cats1fvn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c3), c0))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c4, cconcat, cs1(c0)))
  -| wcel(c4, cword(universe))
  -| wceq(cfv(chash, c4), c3)
} = {
  syl5eq(cfv(c2, c3), c0, cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqtri(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), cfv(co(c4, cconcat, cs1(c0)), co(nat0, caddc, cfv(chash, c4))))
  fveq12i(c2, c3, co(c4, cconcat, cs1(c0)), co(nat0, caddc, cfv(chash, c4)))
  eqtr2i(c3, co(nat0, caddc, cfv(chash, c4)), co(nat0, caddc, c3))
  oveq2i(nat0, caddc, cfv(chash, c4), c3)
  addid2i(c3)
  nn0cni(c3)
  eqeltrri(c3, cn0, cfv(chash, c4))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(chash, c4), cn0), wcel(c4, cword(universe)))
  lencl(c4, universe)
  mp3an(wceq(cfv(co(c4, cconcat, cs1(c0)), co(nat0, caddc, cfv(chash, c4))), cfv(cs1(c0), nat0)), wcel(c4, cword(universe)), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(universe)), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0)))))
  s1cli(c0)
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0)))), wcel(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), cn))

  oveq12d(<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 . c4 . c5 ">, cconcat, <" c6 ">, <" c7 . c8 . c9 . c10 . c11 . c12 ">, <" c13 ">, w0)
  s6eqd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, w0)
  s1eqd(c6, c13, w0)
  df-s7(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  df-s7(c7, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, c13)
}

  s7eqd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, c13, c14, w0)
  s1eqd(c7, c15, w0)
  df-s8(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)

blocks.content: The domain of a doubleton word is an unordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)

thm s2dm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdm(cs2(c0, c1)), cpr(nat0, nat1))
} = {
  fdmi(cs2(c0, c1), cpr(nat0, nat1), universe)
  mpbi(wf(cs2(c0, c1), cpr(nat0, nat1), universe), wf(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))), universe))
  ax-mp(wf(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))), universe), wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(universe)))
  s2cli(c0, c1)
  wrdf(cs2(c0, c1), universe)
  feq2i(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))), universe, cpr(nat0, nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))), cpr(nat0, nat1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2))
  s2len(c0, c1)
  syl6eq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))), cpr(nat0, nat1), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2))
  oveq2(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2, nat0, cfzo)
  fzo0to2pr()
}

blocks.name: lsws2
blocks.content: The last symbol of a doubleton word is its second symbol. (Contributed by AV, 8-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsws2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsw, cs2(c2, c0)), c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(clsw, cs2(c2, c0)), c0, cfv(cs2(c2, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c0)), cmin, nat1)), cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1), wcel(c0, c1))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsw, cs2(c2, c0)), cfv(cs2(c2, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c0)), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cs2(c2, c0), cword(universe)))
  s2cli(c2, c0)
  lsw(cs2(c2, c0), cword(universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c2, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c0)), cmin, nat1)), cfv(cs2(c2, c0), nat1)))
  fveq2i(cs2(c2, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c0)), cmin, nat1), nat1)
  eqtri(co(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c0)), cmin, nat1), nat1, co(nat2, cmin, nat1))
  oveq1i(cfv(chash, cs2(c2, c0)), cmin, nat1, nat2)
  s2len(c2, c0)
  2m1e1()
  s2fv1(c0, c1, c2)
}

} = {

  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsw, cs3(c2, c3, c0)), cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c0)), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cs3(c2, c3, c0), cword(universe)))
  s3cli(c2, c3, c0)
  lsw(cs3(c2, c3, c0), cword(universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c0)), cmin, nat1)), cfv(cs3(c2, c3, c0), nat2)))
  fveq2i(cs3(c2, c3, c0), co(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c0)), cmin, nat1), nat2)
  eqtri(co(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c0)), cmin, nat1), nat2, co(nat3, cmin, nat1))
  oveq1i(cfv(chash, cs3(c2, c3, c0)), cmin, nat1, nat3)
  s3len(c2, c3, c0)
  3m1e2()
  s3fv2(c0, c1, c2, c3)

blocks.name: s2prop
blocks.content: A length 2 word is an unordered pair of ordered pairs. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm s2prop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))))
} = {
  syl5eq(cs2(c0, c2), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  df-s2(c0, c2)
  3eqtrd(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), cun(cs1(c0), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2))), cun(csn(cop(nat0, c0)), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), cun(cs1(c0), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2)))), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)))
  s1cl(c0, c1)
  cats1un(cs1(c0), c1, c2)
  uneq1d(cs1(c0), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2)), csn(cop(nat0, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cs1(c0), csn(cop(nat0, c0))))
  s1val(c0, c1)
  syl5eqr(cun(csn(cop(nat0, c0)), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2))), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  df-pr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2))
  preq2d(cop(nat0, c0), cop(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2), cop(nat1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  opeq1d(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), c2, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1))
  s1len(c0)
}

blocks.name: s3tpop
blocks.content: A length 3 word is an unordered triple of ordered pairs. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm s3tpop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cs3(c0, c2, c3), ctp(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2), cop(nat2, c3))))
} = {
  syl5eq(cs3(c0, c2, c3), ctp(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2), cop(nat2, c3)), co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  df-s3(c0, c2, c3)
  3eqtrd(co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)), ctp(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2), cop(nat2, c3)), cun(cs2(c0, c2), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3))), cun(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(nat2, c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  stoic3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)), cun(cs2(c0, c2), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3)))), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)))
  s2cl(c0, c1, c2)
  cats1un(cs2(c0, c2), c1, c3)
  uneq12d(cs2(c0, c2), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3)), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(nat2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))))
  s2prop(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3)), csn(cop(nat2, c3))))
  sneqi(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3), cop(nat2, c3))
  opeq1i(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3, nat2)
  s2len(c0, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cun(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(nat2, c3))), ctp(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2), cop(nat2, c3))))
  eqcomi(cun(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(nat2, c3))), ctp(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2), cop(nat2, c3)))
  df-tp(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2), cop(nat2, c3))
}

blocks.name: s4prop

  simpr(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  cats1un(cs3(c0, c2, c3), c1, c4)
  uneq1d(cs3(c0, c2, c3), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c2, c3)), c4)), cun(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  eqtrd(cs3(c0, c2, c3), cun(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3))), cun(cs2(c0, c2), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))

  unass(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), c3)), csn(cop(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c2, c3)), c4)))

blocks.name: s3fn
blocks.content: A length 3 word is a function with a triple as domain. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 23-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: funcnvs1

thm funcnvs2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wfun(ccnv(cs2(c0, c2))))
} = {

  mp3an12i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wfun(ccnv(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)))), wcel(nat0, universe), wcel(nat1, universe), wne(c0, c2))

  funcnvpr(nat0, universe, nat1, universe, c0, c2)
  funeqd(ccnv(cs2(c0, c2)), ccnv(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
  cnveqd(cs2(c0, c2), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))))
  s2prop(c0, c1, c2)
}

  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(nat0, universe), wcel(nat1, universe)), wa(wcel(nat2, universe), wcel(nat3, universe))))

blocks.name: s2f1o
blocks.content: A length 2 word with mutually different symbols is a one-to-one function onto the set of the symbols. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm s2f1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  jctil(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c3, cs2(c0, c2))), wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wceq(c3, cs2(c0, c2)))
  0z()
  jctil(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c3, cs2(c0, c2))), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c2, c1))

  1z()

  simpl3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wceq(c3, cs2(c0, c2)))
  0ne1()
  f1oprg(nat0, cz, c0, c1, nat1, cz, c2, c1)
  f1oeq123d(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), cpr(nat0, nat1), cpr(c0, c2), c3, cpr(nat0, nat1), cpr(c0, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c3, cs2(c0, c2))))
  biimpa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c3, cs2(c0, c2)), wceq(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), c3))

  eqcom(c3, cs2(c0, c2))
  eqeq1d(cs2(c0, c2), c3, cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))))

blocks.name: s4dom

  uneq12d(cdm(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))), cdm(cpr(cop(nat2, c3), cop(nat3, c4))), cpr(nat0, nat1), cpr(nat2, nat3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(cdm(cpr(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat1, c2))), cpr(nat0, nat1)))
  dmpropg(c0, c1, c2, c1, nat0, nat1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(cdm(cpr(cop(nat2, c3), cop(nat3, c4))), cpr(nat2, nat3)))

}

} = {
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cs2(c3, c4)), wa(wceq(cs1(c0), cs1(c3)), wceq(cs1(c2), cs1(c4))), wceq(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4))))
  eqeq12d(cs2(c0, c2), cs2(c3, c4), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cs2(c0, c2), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2))))
  df-s2(c0, c2)
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cs2(c3, c4), co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4))))
  df-s2(c3, c4)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wb(wceq(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4))), wa(wceq(cs1(c0), cs1(c3)), wceq(cs1(c2), cs1(c4)))), wa(wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c2), cword(c1))), wa(wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c4), cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), cfv(chash, cs1(c3))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c2), cword(c1))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c2), cword(c1)))
  s1cl(c0, c1)
  s1cl(c2, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c4), cword(c1))))
  anim12i(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c4), cword(c1)))
  s1cl(c3, c1)
  s1cl(c4, c1)
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), cfv(chash, cs1(c3))))
  eqtr4i(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), cfv(chash, cs1(c3)), nat1)
  s1len(c0)

thm s3eqs2s1eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))), wb(wceq(cs3(c0, c2, c3), cs3(c4, c5, c6)), wa(wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cs2(c4, c5)), wceq(cs1(c3), cs1(c6)))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))), wceq(cs3(c0, c2, c3), cs3(c4, c5, c6)), wa(wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cs2(c4, c5)), wceq(cs1(c3), cs1(c6))), wceq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)), co(cs2(c4, c5), cconcat, cs1(c6))))
  eqeq12d(cs3(c0, c2, c3), cs3(c4, c5, c6), co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)), co(cs2(c4, c5), cconcat, cs1(c6)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))), wceq(cs3(c0, c2, c3), co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3))))
  df-s3(c0, c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))), wceq(cs3(c4, c5, c6), co(cs2(c4, c5), cconcat, cs1(c6))))
  df-s3(c4, c5, c6)
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))), wb(wceq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)), co(cs2(c4, c5), cconcat, cs1(c6))), wa(wceq(cs2(c0, c2), cs2(c4, c5)), wceq(cs1(c3), cs1(c6)))), wa(wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1))), wa(wcel(cs2(c4, c5), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c6), cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), cfv(chash, cs2(c4, c5))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1)), wa(wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1))))
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wa(wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c3), cword(c1)))
  s2cl(c0, c1, c2)
  s1cl(c3, c1)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1)), wa(wcel(cs2(c4, c5), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c6), cword(c1))))
  3impa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1), wa(wcel(cs2(c4, c5), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c6), cword(c1))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wcel(c6, c1), wcel(cs2(c4, c5), cword(c1)), wcel(cs1(c6), cword(c1)))
  s2cl(c4, c1, c5)
  s1cl(c6, c1)
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c6, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), cfv(chash, cs2(c4, c5))))
  eqtr4i(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c2)), cfv(chash, cs2(c4, c5)), nat2)
  s2len(c0, c2)
  s2len(c4, c5)
  ccatopth(cs2(c0, c2), c1, cs1(c3), cs2(c4, c5), cs1(c6))
}

thm s3eqs2s1eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1))‚Üí(<" c0 . c2 . c3 "> = <" c4 . c5 . c6 "> ‚Üî(<" c0 . c2 "> = <" c4 . c5 "> ‚àß <" c3 "> = <" c6 ">)))
} = {
  bitrd(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1)), <" c0 . c2 . c3 "> = <" c4 . c5 . c6 ">, (<" c0 . c2 "> = <" c4 . c5 "> ‚àß <" c3 "> = <" c6 ">), (<" c0 . c2 ">[++]<" c3 ">)=(<" c4 . c5 ">[++]<" c6 ">))
  eqeq12d(<" c0 . c2 . c3 ">, <" c4 . c5 . c6 ">, (<" c0 . c2 ">[++]<" c3 ">), (<" c4 . c5 ">[++]<" c6 ">), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1)))
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1)), <" c0 . c2 . c3 "> =(<" c0 . c2 ">[++]<" c3 ">))
  df-s3(c0, c2, c3)
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1)), <" c4 . c5 . c6 "> =(<" c4 . c5 ">[++]<" c6 ">))
  df-s3(c4, c5, c6)
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1)), ((<" c0 . c2 ">[++]<" c3 ">)=(<" c4 . c5 ">[++]<" c6 ">)‚Üî(<" c0 . c2 "> = <" c4 . c5 "> ‚àß <" c3 "> = <" c6 ">)), (<" c0 . c2 "> ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß <" c3 "> ‚àà Word(c1)), (<" c4 . c5 "> ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß <" c6 "> ‚àà Word(c1)), (# ` <" c0 . c2 ">)=(# ` <" c4 . c5 ">))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), (c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1), (<" c0 . c2 "> ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß <" c3 "> ‚àà Word(c1)))
  3impa(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c1, (<" c0 . c2 "> ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß <" c3 "> ‚àà Word(c1)))
  anim12i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà c1, <" c0 . c2 "> ‚àà Word(c1), <" c3 "> ‚àà Word(c1))
  s2cl(c0, c1, c2)
  s1cl(c3, c1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), (c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1), (<" c4 . c5 "> ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß <" c6 "> ‚àà Word(c1)))
  3impa(c4 ‚àà c1, c5 ‚àà c1, c6 ‚àà c1, (<" c4 . c5 "> ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß <" c6 "> ‚àà Word(c1)))
  anim12i((c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1), c6 ‚àà c1, <" c4 . c5 "> ‚àà Word(c1), <" c6 "> ‚àà Word(c1))
  s2cl(c4, c1, c5)
  s1cl(c6, c1)
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c1)), (# ` <" c0 . c2 ">)=(# ` <" c4 . c5 ">))

thm s3eq3seq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

blocks.name: ccatw2s1ccatws2
blocks.content: The concatenation of a word with two singleton words equals the concatenation of the word with the doubleton word consisting of the symbols of the two singletons. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro/AV, 21-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: ccat2s1fvwALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ ccat2s1fvw using words of length 2, see ~ df-s2 . A symbol of the concatenation of a word with two single symbols corresponding to the symbol of the word. (Contributed by AV, 22-Sep-2018.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro/AV, 21-Oct-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: eqwrds3
blocks.content: A word is equal with a length 3 string iff it has length 3 and the same symbol at each position. (Contributed by AV, 12-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqwrds3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  s3cl(c2, c1, c3, c4)

blocks.name: s3iunsndisj
blocks.content: The union of singletons consisting of length 3 strings which have distinct first and third symbols are disjunct. (Contributed by AV, 17-May-2021.)

blocks.name: ofs1
blocks.content: Letterwise operations on a single letter word. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Oct-2018.)

thm ofs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(cs1(c0), cof(c4), cs1(c2)), cs1(co(c0, c4, c2))))
} = {
  syl6eqr(co(cs1(c0), cof(c4), cs1(c2)), cs1(co(c0, c4, c2)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), co(c0, c4, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  offval2(hs0, cs1(c0), c4, cs1(c2), csn(nat0), c0, c2, universe, c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(csn(nat0), universe))
  snex(nat0)
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cs1(c0), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c0)))
  eqtrd(cs1(c0), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c0), csn(cop(nat0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  s1val(c0, c1)
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csn(cop(nat0, c0)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c0)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cs1(c2), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c2)))
  eqtrd(cs1(c2), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c2), csn(cop(nat0, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  s1val(c2, c3)
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(csn(cop(nat0, c2)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), c2)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, c2, c3)
  eqtri(cs1(co(c0, c4, c2)), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), co(c0, c4, c2)), csn(cop(nat0, co(c0, c4, c2))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cs1(co(c0, c4, c2)), csn(cop(nat0, co(c0, c4, c2)))), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), universe))
  s1val(co(c0, c4, c2), universe)
  mp2an(wceq(csn(cop(nat0, co(c0, c4, c2))), cmpt(hs0, csn(nat0), co(c0, c4, c2))), wcel(nat0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), universe))
  0nn0()
  ovex(c0, c4, c2)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, co(c0, c4, c2), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(nat0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c4, c2))
}

thm ofs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(<" c0 ">[oF(c4)]<" c2 ">)= <"(c0[c4]c2)">)
} = {
  syl6eqr((<" c0 ">[oF(c4)]<" c2 ">), <"(c0[c4]c2)">, (hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶(c0[c4]c2)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  offval2(hs0, <" c0 ">, c4, <" c2 ">, { 0 }, c0, c2, universe, c1, c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), { 0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  snex(nat0)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, hs0 ‚àà { 0 })
  simplr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, hs0 ‚àà { 0 })
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, <" c0 "> =(hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶ c0))
  eqtrd(<" c0 ">, (hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶ c0), { < 0, c0 > }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  s1val(c0, c1)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, { < 0, c0 > } =(hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶ c0), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, <" c2 "> =(hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶ c2))
  eqtrd(<" c2 ">, (hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶ c2), { < 0, c2 > }, c2 ‚àà c3)
  s1val(c2, c3)
  mpan(c2 ‚àà c3, { < 0, c2 > } =(hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶ c2), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, c2, c3)
  eqtri(<"(c0[c4]c2)">, (hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶(c0[c4]c2)), { < 0,(c0[c4]c2)> })
  ax-mp(<"(c0[c4]c2)"> = { < 0,(c0[c4]c2)> }, (c0[c4]c2)‚àà ùïå)
  s1val((c0[c4]c2), universe)
  mp2an({ < 0,(c0[c4]c2)> } =(hs0 ‚àà { 0 } ‚Ü¶(c0[c4]c2)), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (c0[c4]c2)‚àà ùïå)
  0nn0()
  ovex(c0, c4, c2)
  fmptsn(hs0, nat0, cn0, (c0[c4]c2), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ 0 })
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c4]c2))
}

thm ofs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cof(c6), cs2(c3, c5)), cs2(co(c0, c6, c3), co(c2, c6, c5))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(cs2(c0, c2), cof(c6), cs2(c3, c5)), cs2(co(c0, c6, c3), co(c2, c6, c5)), co(co(cs1(c0), cof(c6), cs1(c3)), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cof(c6), cs1(c5))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  syl5eq(co(cs2(c0, c2), cof(c6), cs2(c3, c5)), co(co(cs1(c0), cof(c6), cs1(c3)), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cof(c6), cs1(c5))), co(co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), cof(c6), co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c5))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  oveq12i(cs2(c0, c2), cof(c6), cs2(c3, c5), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c2)), co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c5)))
  df-s2(c0, c2)
  df-s2(c3, c5)
  ofccat(cs1(c0), cs1(c2), c6, cs1(c3), cs1(c5), c1, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  s1cld(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  s1cld(c2, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  s1cld(c3, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  s1cld(c5, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), cfv(chash, cs1(c3))))
  eqtr4i(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), cfv(chash, cs1(c3)), nat1)
  s1len(c0)
  s1len(c3)
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c2)), cfv(chash, cs1(c5))))
  eqtr4i(cfv(chash, cs1(c2)), cfv(chash, cs1(c5)), nat1)
  s1len(c2)
  s1len(c5)
  syl6eqr(co(co(cs1(c0), cof(c6), cs1(c3)), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cof(c6), cs1(c5))), cs2(co(c0, c6, c3), co(c2, c6, c5)), co(cs1(co(c0, c6, c3)), cconcat, cs1(co(c2, c6, c5))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  oveq12d(co(cs1(c0), cof(c6), cs1(c3)), cconcat, co(cs1(c2), cof(c6), cs1(c5)), cs1(co(c0, c6, c3)), cs1(co(c2, c6, c5)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(co(cs1(c0), cof(c6), cs1(c3)), cs1(co(c0, c6, c3))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))
  ofs1(c0, c1, c3, c4, c6)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(co(cs1(c2), cof(c6), cs1(c5)), cs1(co(c2, c6, c5))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c5, c4))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))
  ofs1(c2, c1, c5, c4, c6)
  df-s2(co(c0, c6, c3), co(c2, c6, c5))
